item.description:
Hi all!

Are you ready for more bully fun?

I'm thinking we should try meeting at East Park (also known as Cristoforo Columbo Park) which is located on Shrewsbury Street in Worcester, next to Anthony's Restaurant. Parking is available on the street directly in front of the park. We'll be meeting at the bocce ball area right next to the tennis courts - this area is fenced in.

For directions:

http://maps.google.co...

Cancellation procedure: If the weather isn't cooperating, I'll send a cancellation notice by email, and I'll also post the cancellation on the meetup website 2 hours before the meetup time.

I hope to see you all there!

- Kathleen
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the ones with the big white bulldog. :)

group.name: The Worcester English Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: May Meetup at East Park
